00012 typedef enum _ASIPostFormat {

00014     ASIURLEncodedPostFormat = 1
00015         
00016 } ASIPostFormat;

00018 @interface ASIFormDataRequest : ASIHTTPRequest {
00019 
00020         // Parameters that will be POSTed to the url
00021         NSMutableDictionary *postData;
00022         
00023         // Files that will be POSTed to the url
00024         NSMutableDictionary *fileData;
00025

00027

00031 #pragma mark utilities 
00032 - (NSString*)encodeURL:(NSString *)string; 
00033  
00034 #pragma mark setup request
00035 
00036 // Add a POST variable to the request
00037 - (void)setPostValue:(id <NSObject>)value forKey:(NSString *)key;
00038 
00039 // Add the contents of a local file to the request
00040 - (void)setFile:(NSString *)filePath forKey:(NSString *)key;
00041 
00042 // Same as above, but you can specify the content-type and file name
00043 - (void)setFile:(id)data withFileName:(NSString *)fileName andContentType:(NSString *)contentType forKey:(NSString *)key;
00044 
00045 // Add the contents of an NSData object to the request
00046 - (void)setData:(NSData *)data forKey:(NSString *)key;
00047 
00048 // Same as above, but you can specify the content-type and file name
00049 - (void)setData:(id)data withFileName:(NSString *)fileName andContentType:(NSString *)contentType forKey:(NSString *)key;
